titleStmt.title: A prettie newe ballad, intytuled: the crowe sits vpon the wall, please one and please all To the tune of, please one and please all.
titleStmt.author: Tarlton, Richard, d. 1588.

publicationStmt.publisher: for Henry Kyrkham, dwelling at the little North doore of Paules, at the signe of the blacke Boy,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the little North doore of Paules, at the signe of the blacke Boy
